attributes.action: Seize a vehicle and crush it the driver of the vehicle gets caught fly tipping
attributes.additional_details: I have several friends who are councillors where i live who are aware and saw pictures that i have sent them on my facebook page and they are disgusted and are doing their upmost to combat this with caerphilly council ( south wales ) and i got a friend who’s job it is on the council to clear up after the fly tipper  and  he's told me its getting a lot worse  its also a big big problem with the other councils in wales as it is around the country
attributes.background:
Fly tipping is happening everywhere now and its getting worse throughout the UK .
Where i live in south wales we have some beautiful countryside but its getting blighted by fly tipping as it is in different parts of our country  , this isn't only unsightly but causes vermin

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because fly tipping policy in Wales is the responsibility of the Welsh Assembly and Government.

You can petition the Welsh Assembly here:

https://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
